Body: {"id":"chatcmpl-716","object":"chat.completion","created":1765436723,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"","reasoning":"The user asks in Russian: \"Где впервые упоминается Пончик?\" Means \"Where is 'Ponchik' first mentioned?\" Likely referring to a character, maybe a pet name, or a term like \"Пончик\".
